The claim is based on an article by goss: which mentioned that Lois Frankel took a helicopter ride to a dinner party. This article serves as the primary source of the claim.
The claim is also supported by an advert: a conservative PAC, which depicted Frankel's headshot inside a cartoon image of a helicopter flying near a mansion with balloons falling from the sky. This visual representation reinforces the claim made by Adam Hasner.
The fact: checkers did not provide a definitive verdict on the authenticity of the claim, but they mentioned that they had previously fact-checked other claims made by the PAC regarding Frankel's pay raise and spending on a marble shower. These previous fact-checks indicate a pattern of scrutiny towards the claims made against Frankel's actions.
